channel.title: Homes on Haipeng Yu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Haipeng Yu

item.description: About me I am an Assistant Professor in Artificial Intelligence in Animal Omics Sciences in the Department of Animal Sciences at the University of Florida. My research group (AIAOS) primarily focuses on integrating high-dimensional heterogeneous -omics data to advance agriculture using statistical modeling, machine learning, and computational methods. I will be joining the Department of Animal Sciences at the University of Florida as an Assistant Professor in Artificial Intelligence in Animal Omics Sciences starting August 2022.
